nodes.text: The title "Hero With No Fear" was a moniker given to Jedi Knight and General Anakin Skywalker during the Clone Wars. Skywalker was glorified by the title on the HoloNet News.

The "Hero With No Fear" title was reintroduced to Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition. The title was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends article "Republic HoloNet News Core Edition 15:01:03," published on Star Wars Insider 72.
